f8535d50-3166-4798-b2cf-7352bd855ae0.description: Earners of the Inventory Sales Specialist complete the required learning path. Starting with Blue Planet Fundamentals, learning about the portfolio of products, how to position Blue Planet against the eTOM TMF framework, then focusing on the BPI product and how it solves specific problems for customers. Learners then understand how to qualify a BPI sale and what components can be licensed. Finally, how BPI can be integrated with other products to create an intelligent automation solution.
f8535d50-3166-4798-b2cf-7352bd855ae0.name: Inventory Sales Specialist

d9a900ac-aab1-4384-b2c7-c239f562261d.description: Integrity is a core Ciena value and provides a strong moral foundation to our entire business. We believe that honesty, a strong commitment to ethical behavior, and compliance with applicable laws are the keys to successful business dealings and strong customer relationships. We expect all of our partners to comply with applicable law. But more than that, we expect you to protect Ciena’s brand and business reputation by exhibiting the highest standards of ethical behavior and fair competition.
d9a900ac-aab1-4384-b2c7-c239f562261d.name: CPN Code of Business Conduct and Ethics

badge_template_activities.title: After completing this training, if you haven’t already done so, please spend some time reading our Partner Code of Business Conduct and Ethics. The Code provides additional detail regarding the high standards that Ciena sets for itself and expects of its Partners when representing Ciena in the market.

1424376f-c53e-431c-bdf2-09c20f24b8a2.description: Earners of the ROA Sales Specialist badge have gained an understanding of the fundamentals of the Blue Planet portfolio of products, and how to position the portfolio against industry standards. They have studied the market for the ROA product: which specific customer problems can be solved using ROA, how to qualify an ROA sale, and which components can be licensed. Finally, they have learned how ROA is integrated with other products to create intelligent automation solutions.
1424376f-c53e-431c-bdf2-09c20f24b8a2.name: ROA Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the ROA Sales Specialist Program (BPP101).
Pass the ROA Sales Specialist Exam (C877)

40a0871d-eb5f-4c99-ada1-a900df1c921c.description: Earners of the UAA Sales Specialist certification complete the required learning path. Starting with Blue Planet Fundamentals, learning about the portfolio of products, how to position Blue Planet against the eTOM TMF framework, then focusing on the UAA product and how it solves specific problems for customers. Then understand how to qualify a UAA sale and what components can be licensed. Then finally, how UAA can be integrated with other products to create an intelligent automation solution.
40a0871d-eb5f-4c99-ada1-a900df1c921c.name: Unified Assurance and Analytics Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Blue Planet UAA learning Program
Pass the Blue Planet UAA Certification Exam

310f1cf1-bf0e-4812-b9e7-c2ef024fad04.description: Earners of this certification complete the required learning path. Starting with Fundamentals, learning about the portfolio of products, how to position Blue Planet against the eTOM framework, then focusing on the Orchestration products and how these can solve specific problems for customers. Next, understand how to qualify a BPO sale and what components can be licensed. Finally, how BPO products can be integrated with other products to create an intelligent automation solution.
310f1cf1-bf0e-4812-b9e7-c2ef024fad04.name: Orchestration Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Blue Planet Orchestration Sales Specialist

a89d5375-c844-4d6c-9989-0b1d9b616415.description: Earners of the Blue Planet Orchestration Developer credential have learned core skills needed to develop Blue Planet MDSO automation solutions. They understand the MDSO architecture, data model, and resource management concepts. They are able to install the DevOps Toolkit and are competent in the fundamentals of resource adapter development and creation service templates that include remote plans written in Python.
a89d5375-c844-4d6c-9989-0b1d9b616415.name: Orchestration Development Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete  the Developing Service Templates and Remote Plans (C878) course.

Pass the MDSO Development Specialist exam.

a02d09cb-a76e-4f3a-8b05-82c8c67ea9fb.description: Earners of this certification complete the required learning path, starting with Foundational courses on Networking and Programmability, Blue Planet Platform, and Blue Planet Invetory Development that culminates with an Blue Planet Inventory Advanced Development course and a comprehensive theoretical and practical exam. Successful completion of the final exam results in the awarding of the Blue Planet Developer Certification.
a02d09cb-a76e-4f3a-8b05-82c8c67ea9fb.name: Certified Blue Planet Inventory Developer

c15be0af-49a3-468b-8eec-9e2f093a8bed.description: This badge is awarded for the Ciena SAOS 10 Advanced Program - Routing & Switching Learning Course
c15be0af-49a3-468b-8eec-9e2f093a8bed.name: Ciena SAOS 10 Advanced Program

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed the e-learning and IP, MPLS, and VPN Services Hands-on Lab class

47941e07-60ee-4a06-80dd-7052a904b888.name: Ciena SAOS 10 Advanced TS Program

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully achieved an exam score of 80% or above having evaluated your knowledge of the Ciena Routing & Switching Advance Troubleshooting Exam

7e9ca6d2-1baf-4474-b570-bce8e57d9405.description: This Program has been especially created for partners who want to learn more about Ciena’s Broadband / PON Access & Aggregation solution. This badge is issued once the learner has successfully completed the CPNe Partner: Broadband Access and Aggregation Program Pathway.
7e9ca6d2-1baf-4474-b570-bce8e57d9405.name: CPNe - Broadband (PON) Solutions

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the learning pathway.
Quiz passing criteria of 80%.

9c133152-6c44-4778-b044-591e89159ca4.description: Earners of this certification complete the required learning path, starting with UAA Sales Engineer Foundations, learning about the features and functions of UAA, then moving on to UAA Architecture and Integrations to understand how UAA is deployed and how it integrates with other products. Once the training is complete you can take the certification exam.
9c133152-6c44-4778-b044-591e89159ca4.name: UAA Sales Engineer Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the UAA Sales Engineer Specialist program
Pass the UAA Sales Engineer Specialist Exam

158e5b8c-f013-4420-87e7-a1d58dc1e24d.description: Earners of the Orchestration Deployment Expert certification have demonstrated that they have the expertise and core skills needed to install Blue Planet MDSO and NFVO in production environments. It validates their understanding of deployment requirements and their ability to perform installations for standalone, high-availability, and geographic redundant deployments. It also shows their ability to troubleshoot and correct deployment issues to ensure proper operation of Blue planet solutions.
158e5b8c-f013-4420-87e7-a1d58dc1e24d.name: Orchestration Deployment Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Blue Planet Orchestration Deployment Expert Certification exam. The exam includes an online test and a hands-on lab test.

59e45a97-3e80-4a42-bce8-9c4e109ce89a.description: Earners of this certification have complete the required learning path. Starting with ROA Sales Engineer Foundations, learning about the features and modules, how ROA integrates with other products to create solutions and how units are deployed and licensed. We finish with ROA User Interface Foundations, learning about basic UI, and workflows around reporting, dashboards and planning.
59e45a97-3e80-4a42-bce8-9c4e109ce89a.name: ROA Sales Engineer Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the ROA Sales Engineer Specialist learning program
Pass the ROA Sales Engineer Specialist Exam

9e41b03c-9997-4888-8d10-4e778250e057.description: This certification is awarded to individuals who have proven they can design complex networks, overcome complex design objections, and can conduct basic troubleshooting to aid designs. This certification is awarded to individuals who have successfully completed the Ethernet, Access and Aggregation, and Converged IP / Optical Metro Design Master Certifications.
9e41b03c-9997-4888-8d10-4e778250e057.name: Routing and Switching Master Design Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Ethernet Master Design Certification
Access and Aggregation Master Design Certification
Converged IP / Optical Metro Master Design Certification

c8d4255c-d424-4938-bf2e-7e87a8661e5e.description: Ciena Partner Champions is an exclusive partner forum that includes the best and brightest Ciena partner sales engineers from our CPN partner community that thrive on learning and expanding their Ciena expertise.
c8d4255c-d424-4938-bf2e-7e87a8661e5e.name: CPN Champion 2021

badge_template_activities.title: All Partner Champions must be employees of a Professional or an Elite partner in good standing in the Ciena Partner Network, submit  a completed application, and meet the program eligibility requirements.

Champions can solve complex customer challenges for current and prospective customers by effectively positioning Ciena solutions. Demonstrate both expertise in and extraordinary support and advocacy for Ciena, communities, and solutions influence within and outside their organizations and customer engagements. Mentor others to make the most of their investments in Ciena, solutions, and services.
Nomination from Ciena SE Director along with meeting annual program requirements outlined in the program handbook.
